title: Vertical Asymptote
text: Determine what x-value makes the logarithmic functon equal to $$0$$. The x-value will be the value of the vertical asymptote.
speech: Determine what x-value makes the logarithmic functon equal to  0 . The x-value will be the value of the vertical asymptote.

title: Vertical Asymptote
text: When $$x=1$$, the logarithmic functon equal to $$0$$. Therefore, the vertical asymptote is $$x=1$$.
